name: Media Mix
overview:
Haris is a 5 year public relations and communications veteran whoâ€™s worked with some of Pakistanâ€™s leading corporate companies and marketing pros to create brand-building, response-generating, award-winning communications.

Currently as CEO of Media Mix, a specialized consulting firm in publicity, personality management, event management and the sourcing of speakers. We started arranging publicity and promotions campaigns for smaller entrepreneurial, start-up businesses, corporations as well as colleges and universities.

As a leading publicist, image marketing consultant and cross media specialist. The goal of every project is to move the needle - build awareness, change attitudes, create motivation and produce response.

His experience includes B2C, B2B and B2P communications in all media including TV, radio, cinema, prints, outdoor, direct mail, online, image-building, promotion, hype, media manipulation, crisis management, website and now social media.
